definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Ink to write that, should hide the facts written in blood.
sentences.chinese: 墨寫的謊說，決掩不住血寫的事實。

sentences.english: Li told him there were two ways to resolve the situation, Chen said.
sentences.chinese: 李剛講解決問題有兩條路，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: The fourth part introduced the precondition of solution to objective incapability of procedure of execution.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分介紹瞭解決客觀執行不能問題的先決條件。

sentences.english: Daredevil couple decided to vacation far out.
sentences.chinese: 冒失鬼夫婦決定遠出旅遊度假。

sentences.english: Causes for shriveling of painting film and its solution were presented.
sentences.chinese: 分析了漆膜起皺的原因並提出瞭解決方法。

sentences.english: The impact goes far beyond mere sniffles and inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 影響決不僅僅是鼻塞或者不適那麼簡單。

sentences.english: Fighting fire with fire without reconciliation and healing will never solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 以火攻火，不能和解和癒合，絕難解決問題。

sentences.english: In this paper the causes of seal failures are analyzed and the remedy is recommanded.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了該密封的失效原因，提出瞭解決的辦法。

sentences.english: The mysteries of learning English well are just practice and review frequently.
sentences.chinese: 學好英語的祕決就是經常實踐練習和複習。

sentences.english: Two kinds of ways to solve contact copper scraps are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹瞭解決觸點銅屑的兩種方法。

sentences.english: The imperialists will never lay down their butcher knives.
sentences.chinese: 帝國主義分子決不肯放下屠刀。

sentences.english: Putting to death was a recipe in vogue with all trades and professions .
sentences.chinese: 處死是通行一切行業的一種祕決。

sentences.english: If you are having trouble making a decision, try an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在作出決定時有困難，不妨先試驗下。

sentences.english: But while that Tree flourishes she will never come down into Narnia.
sentences.chinese: 但只要這棵樹枝繁葉茂，她就決不敢進入納尼亞。

sentences.english: This was our only exposure to the complexities of the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 我們面臨中東的複雜局面，決不僅僅是隻此一次。

definition: to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
